list: Display the numbered list of all todos. $ node index.js list.
add: Add new Todo item to the Todos list regardless of quotes. All the words behind add are entered as 1 to-do item to the list. You can either use $ node index.js add 'new Todo' OR $ node index.js add new Todo. i.e: $ node index.js add 'do homework' OR $ node index.js add do homework.
remove: Remove a Todo at specified index. Index starts from 1. $ node index.js remove index. i.e: $ node index.js remove 3.
update: Update a Todo at specified index. Index starts from 1. All the words behind update are entered as 1 to-do item to the list. $ node index.js update index 'updated value' OR $ node index.js update index updated value. i.e: $ node index.js update 1 'do breakfast' OR $ node index.js update 1 do breakfast.
reset: Remove all Todos from the Todos list. node index.js reset
help: Display help menu. node index.js help.
